backend/main.mo: Defines authorization mixins, radio/network/transmission types, persistent user and network storage, and query/update methods for profiles and signaling state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking feature requirements to corresponding frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides one‑sentence summaries for numerous frontend components and pages describing their roles and recent behavior updates.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-23-prev: Deployment-only promotion record for Version 23 with detailed pre‑promotion verification checklists.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-30-prev: Deployment-only promotion record for Version 30 including change attestation and an expanded verification checklist.
frontend/docs/publish-preview-to-product: Runbook detailing verification steps and requirements for promoting a preview deployment to production without code changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the PTTStar app root, manifest, and main entry script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, display settings, and categories.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with simple styling and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling install, cache management, and network-first fetch with offline fallbacks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app setup including routing, authentication handling, and profile setup gating.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: App layout component providing header, navigation, and footer structure with auth-aware menus.
Component displaying an audio input level meter with segmented visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wraps children and prompts the user to log in with Internet Identity if no identity is present.
frontend/src/components/ColorAccentPanel: Provides a simple bordered container with optional variant styling for layout grouping.
Renders a page header with title, optional subtitle, and optional icon using neutral dark styling.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceConn: Form for configuring Digital Voice connections, handling presets, validation, state loading, and saving.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceSave: Displays saved Digital Voice configuration details, gateway status, and provides edit guidance.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryBrowser: Allows browsing, filtering, and selecting networks and talkgroups with support for favorites and search.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchConne: Form for creating or editing IAX/DVSwitch connections, including presets, validation, and saving.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchSaved: Shows stored IAX/DVSwitch settings with options to edit or proceed to PTT.
frontend/src/components/InstallAppAction: Provides an install button and iOS-specific instructions for installing the PWA, showing dialogs and handling install prompts.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout flow with status handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/NowHearingList.t: Displays recent transmissions with metadata, showing loading and empty states when needed.
frontend/src/components/PersonalDirector: Manages locally stored personal network entries with add, delete, and form controls.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a required setup dialog for entering callsign and profile data with validation and save logic.
frontend/src/components/PttControl.tsx: Implements a push‑to‑talk button handling press interactions and transmit state visuals.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeStatusBa: Shows real-time connection, transmit, and receive status with dynamic icons and styling.
frontend/src/components/TransmitDisclaim: Displays a warning requiring license acknowledgement before voice features, linking to settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLevelMeter.ts: Tracks microphone audio levels using Web Audio API and returns normalized level and active state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile via react-query and actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Retrieves and toggles favorite networks using react-query and the actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicPttRecorder.ts: Handles push‑to‑talk microphone recording with MediaRecorder and returns the final audio blob URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworks.ts: Fetches builtin networks and performs client-side search filtering via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useNowHearing.ts: Retrieves and updates real-time transmission data, polling periodically via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferredConnectio: Defines connection types and helpers for saving/loading preferred network connections with backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Detects PWA installability, manages install prompts, and identifies iOS and installed states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrzLookup.ts: Runs a QRZ callsign lookup through the actor backend if supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useRememberLoginPrefe: Stores and retrieves the user's 'remember login' preference using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Fetches the caller's user role and admin status from the backend via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRtcPtt.ts: Implements a WebRTC push-to-talk hook managing peer connections, media streams, gateway signaling, and transmission state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, dark theme variables, and utility classes for status lights and accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing React Query and Internet Identity context before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutCompliancePage.t: Renders an about page describing PTTStar, licensing requirements, and digital voice ID guidance.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Displays a live-updating list of recent transmissions with manual refresh and activity metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Provides UI for configuring, saving, and managing IAX/DVSwitch or digital voice connections with quick-setup options.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Allows browsing networks and talkgroups, managing personal entries, and saving directory-based connections for PTT use.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component showing app intro, requirements, and getting-started info for PTTStar.
frontend/src/pages/PttPage.tsx: Push-to-talk page managing connection state, room joining, transmit controls, and real-time activity display.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page allowing users to edit profile, DMR info, preferences, and manage Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/utils/digitalVoiceGatewayCl: WebRTC signaling client for Digital Voice gateways handling WebSocket connection, SDP exchange, and ICE messages.
frontend/src/utils/roomKey.ts: Utility for generating stable room keys and human-readable labels from IAX, Digital Voice, or directory connections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing feature requirements and pending requests for simplified BrandMeister and AllStar connection setup.
